name: Crushed Skull
effect: The character suffers a fatal wound to the head. They are dead.

name: Destroyed Ear
effect: The hit cuts the character's ear off (-5 Perception).

name: Missing Fingers
effect: The character lost a few fingers from the powerful blow (-5 to Combat skills).

name: Punctured Lung
effect: The character's lung is permanently damaged (-5 Stamina).

name: Cut Nose
effect: The character lost their nose (-5 CHA).

name: Swollen Brain
effect: The character suffered a severe brain injury (-5 INT).

name: Damaged Tendons
effect: The characterâ€™s arm tendons have suffered irreparable damage (-5 STR).

name: Nerve Damage
effect: Permanent nerve damage means the character can only spend 3 Stamina points on defensive maneuvers each round.

name: Minor Artery Severed
effect: The maximum number of Wounds the character may receive is reduced by 1.

name: Weakened
effect: The injury has left the character's constitution weakened (+2 to all incoming damage).
